LanguageData.RPHexane.label: Hexane
LanguageData.RPHexane.description: Hexane is an alkane of six carbon atoms, with the chemical formula C6H14. A colorless liquid, odorless when pure, with boiling points between 50 and 70 °C (122 and 158 °F). They are widely used as cheap, relatively safe, largely unreactive, and easily evaporated non-polar solvents.
